description: Eastern Redbud (Cercis canadensis f. alba 'Royal White') is an amazing plant species that has a stunning beauty throughout its life cycle. It has gorgeous tinged white and pink flowers in the spring months and large heart shaped leaves that stay green throughout summer. In the fall, its leaves turn a beautiful yellow. Its impressive architectural shape never fails to draw attention and it's quite compact, which makes it perfect for small landscaping projects. Lastly, it is strong and hardy, which makes it perfect for a variety of climates, from wet to dry. All in all, Eastern Redbud is a wonderful choice for anyone looking for a beautiful specimen plant.
